### Preview of Data
The data used is from the [@388Brains] set of cohorts, with its samples. The raw data of the annotated expression matrices can be found [here](https://brainscope.gersteinlab.org/output-sample-annotated-matrix.html). This is an overview of each cohort:
- CMC: 100 samples, 
- DevBrain: 16 samples, 
- Girgenti-multiome: 18 samples
- IsoHuB: 4 samples
- LIBD: 10 samples
- Ma_et_al: 2 samples, [@MaSestan]
- MultiomeBrain:20 samples, 
- PTSDBrainomics: 18 samples, 
- SZBDMulti-Seq: 72 samples, 
- UCLA-ASD: 51 samples
- Velmeshev_et_al: 26 samples [@Velmeshev]
